ygData.subject: Re: The Ark rebuilding begins
ygData.msgSnippet: Magnus nodded. I know but it is the best we can do. Also ask your leader if he isinterested in this peace between these factions. he walked over to the ash

 Magnus nodded. I know but it is the best we can do. Also ask your leader if 
he isinterested in this peace between these factions." he walked over to the 
ash that once was the ark. He looked for any salvagable material.
